name: 2022 4th Asia Symposium on Image Processing
content: ASIP 2021 information: 1\. ASIP 2022 is supported by ACM Singapore Chapter, Singapore Institute of Electronics and some other universities and Societies. 2\. Accepted papers will be published in the Conference Proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). 3\. Prof. Xudong Jiang, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, Prof. Yulin Wang, Wuhan University, China will be the keynote speakers.
